data.name: Advisor
data.value:
Excellent! You now know how to obtain advice.
Please note that the Advisor's suggestions are more on a conservative, defensive side. Use it as a guide as you slowly develop your own unique strategy for a mighty empire!

data.name: Advisor2
data.value: Excellent! Again, note that the Advisor's suggestions are more on a conservative, defensive side. Use it as a guide as you slowly develop your own unique strategy for a mighty empire!

data.name: BarracksRecruitTime
data.value:
Exactly!!

At level 1, it takes {0} minutes to recruit Infantry, but at level 13, only {1} minutes.

You can even bring this time down to just {2} minutes at level 25!

The higher the level of the barracks, the sooner you can have a mighty army!

data.name: BattleSimCM
data.value:
That is correct! So as you can see, all attacking Citizen Militia were killed and the defender was left with a good percentage of his troops. Citizen Militia make very poor attacking troops. They are much better at defending.

Once you know what troops are defending a village (by spying on it), you can use the battle simulator to find out what it would take to destroy the defending garrison.

data.name: BattleSimLC
data.value:
That is correct!!

So as you can see Light Cavalry is much better at attacking than Citizen Militia. Knights make even better offensive troops!

However, note that since Cavalry units consume a lot more food, are more expensive and take longer to recruit than Citizen Militia, you can never compare them 1 to 1 but you must take all these factors into consideration.

The general lesson is this - use foot soldiers like Citizen Militia and Infantry to defend your village, and cavalry to attack.

data.name: BattleSimLCWithWall
data.value:
Right!!

Defensive walls and towers are really helpful to the defender. You should always try to have your walls and towers at the maximum level.

data.name: BattleSimRamAndTreb
data.value:
That is correct!!

So there you go - the medieval arms race! defender puts up walls, attacker constructs rams. Defender builds towers, attacker constructs siege engines like the trebuchet.

The lesson to learn is always build your walls and towers hence force the attacker to send rams and trebuchet with the attack. Secondly, never attack a village without including rams and trebuchets in the attack or you will suffer much greater losses.

data.name: BattleSimSpies
data.value:
Exactly! So as you can see, the chance for success is high, and there is only {0}% chance that the defender will be told it was you spying.

Chance the spies will
be successful		 {1}%
Chance the defender will know
the identity of spies		 {0}%
Chance the defender will
see the spies coming		 {2}%


The 'Chance the defender will see the spies coming' refers to the chance that the defender will know that someone is trying to spy on them. If they know, they can move more spies into this village to increase their chances of learning the identity of the attacker, but as you can see, there is a chance they will not know they are even being spied on until it is too late!

There is a lot more detail to learn about spying so I suggest you read more on spies on the Units Help page later.

data.name: ClanAllies
data.value:
Excellent! Its critical for you to know the diplomatic landscape of your clan.

Perhaps you would like to become a diplomat? Help the clan leadership decide on such matters, perhaps become a liason to one of your allies? Then get active, talk to people around you, BE ACTIVE on your clan's forum - once leaders notice your enthusiasm, they will likely offer you important positions!

data.name: ClanLeaders
data.value: Good! Remember, most clans welcome active players who want to particpate in clan affairs. Talk to your leaders, get active, and soon you may find yourself promoted!

data.name: ClanMates
data.value:
Excellent!! Note that the clan icon will light up when ever there is a new post on the forum.

STRESSING ONCE AGAIN - BE ACTIVE in your clan. Leaders look for that and you are much more likely to get help when needed when you are known to the clan.

Active members are an asset to a clan, inactive members are often considered dead weight.

ALSO, clan leaders will often require active members to check in on the forum or risk being dismissed or cannibalized by the clan.

data.name: DefenseFactor
data.value:
That is correct!! Defensive factor of {0}% means your troops fight with a {1}% bonus!

So if you have 100 Infantry defending, it is the same as if you had {2}.

Defensive towers can be destroyed only by trebuchets. Walls on the otherhand are destroyed by rams.

data.name: FindInactives
data.value: Very good!! Keep an eye on such villages.

data.name: Food
data.value:
Excellent! Note that your food is consumed in 2 ways - by troops and by maintenance workers on village buildings.

Troops consume food, that is obvious but also, since each building requires a certain amount of workers to maintain it and those workers consume food, therefore indirectly, upgrading buildings also requires food.

You can see exactly how much food different buildings need, and how much food different troops need from the help menu, the Buildings and Units menu items

data.name: Friends
data.value:
Excellent! Please note that you can also see the list of your friends from the Player Ranking screen.

To see how many friends other players have, go to the Friend Network Ranking screen.

Both accessible from the ranking menu item

data.name: InfantryRecruitTime
data.value:
That is correct!!

It takes {0} minutes to recruit Infantry.

But, this is at level 1 Barracks

As you upgrade your Barracks, this time is shortened but lets leave this to your next quest!

data.name: Invite
data.value:
Excellent! So this is how you can invite your facebook friends!

Please note, Realm of Empires is a strategy game where co-operation with other players is absolutely necessary! There is no stronger alliance than one composed of real life friends.

data.name: JoinClan
data.value:
Congratulations on your choice of alliance!

Remember to stay active in your clan's affairs.

Do you want some administrative role in the clan? Then be active, and ask your leader. The clan leader often looks for people who want to help out.

Do you want a leadership role in the clan? This may not happen right away, however, if you stay active and prove yourself, you may soon find your way on the council and be able to shape the history of the realm and the fate of hundreds if not thousands of players!

data.name: LootingInactives
data.value: That's correct! But don't rush into things. Aim towards being able to loot inactive villages by locating inactives, recruiting some Light Cavalry etc.

data.name: Mail
data.value:
Great!! All messages you move to this folder will never be deleted and will be categorized as you like

Premium features support further development of the game! We hope you will consider supporting us!

data.name: Map1
data.value:
Good! You will use the map a lot in the coming days.

REMEMBER to get to know your neighbours! Not only your clan mates but also other players near your village. You may find their friendship very beneficial to you in time of need.

data.name: Map2
data.value: Good! Now you can see more of the world at one time.

data.name: MyPoints
data.value:
Excellent!!
As you grow your village, and as you conquer other villages, your points and rank will grow!

data.name: OtherRealms
data.value:
That's right!!

Feel free to explore other realms!

Explore our wiki some more. We maintain an extensive list of suggestions from players like you - your suggestions matter so don't be afraid to voice your opinion!!

data.name: Q2_ApplyTags
data.value:
Very good!!

This is how you tag your villages. You can untag a village in a simillar manner.

You can also do this from the My Tags page (click Edit Tags link from the filter icon popup)

data.name: Q2_CreateTags
data.value:
Great!!

Tags are used to describe a village.

For example, by tagging a village with 'DEFENSE' tag, you are saying this villlage is a defense village. By tagging it with a 'SECTORA' tag, you are saying this village is located in sector A.

You can tag a village with DEFENSE tag AND SECTORA tag thus saying it is a defensive village in sector A.

Tags, althgough maybe a little confusing at start, are a very powerful tool for managing your kingdom!

data.name: Q2_Filters
data.value:
Super!!

This is how you select a filter. You village list is now limited to villages which fall under this filter.

data.name: Q2_FiltersSummaryPages
data.value:
Great!!

So now with filters limiting your summary pages, you can easily see what needs to be done in your kingdom.

data.name: Q2_MultiFilter
data.value:
Excellent!! This is how you create custom multi-tag filters!

You may have noticed that you did not have to create all the other filters you have. This is because when you create a tag, the system automatically creates a filter with the same name.This is just a plain filter however, a filter that you can change or even delete altogether.

data.name: RecruitSpies
data.value:
Nice! Sometimes 1 spy is enough but more spies will greatly increase your chance of success!

Use the Battle simulator to calculate your odds. Do NOT spy on a village until you know your odds and are comfortable with the risks!

data.name: Reports
data.value:
Great!! All reports you move to this folder will never be deleted and will be categorized as you like

Premium features support further development of the game! We hope you will consider supporting us!

data.name: Silver
data.value:
Very Good!!

Remember that when your treasury fills up, your silver mine stops producing silver! Be sure to check your village daily to ensure uninterrupted production.

Note that Realm Of Empires was designed to be played with as little as just a few minutes per day yet offer you new and unique challenges over many months of play!

data.name: SilverProduction
data.value: That is correct! Something to look forward to! :)

data.name: Stable
data.value:
Great, now you will be able to recruit light cavalry!

Light Cavalry will become useful for you when you want to start looting abandoned villages for silver, but more on that a bit later on

data.name: Support
data.value:
Congratulations!!

You managed to convince someone to help you! Make sure you make friends with your neighbours.

With their help, you can literally be indestructible. If you are interested, use the Battle Simulator to see how many armies it would take to destroy 50,000 infantry defending a village with level 10 towers & walls.

data.name: Tavern
data.value: Spies will be necessary for you when you want to start looting abandoned villages for silver, but more on that a bit later on!

data.name: TOU
data.value:
Very good!

Please remember, it is only a game (the greatest game on facebook, true), but still just a game ;)

Play fair, treat others with respect and enjoy!

data.name: Tutorial
data.value: Very good! You now know the basics! Your reward has been deposited in your treasury. May it serve you well!!

data.name: Options
data.value: Great! now you know where to go to personalize your game experience!

data.name: BrrcksLvl1
data.value: Great! Now you can recruit Citizen Millitia! But don't spend all your silver on recruitment yet! You still have a lot more to do to build your village into a fortress!

data.name: SMLvl3
data.value: Super! Your silver production is growing fast!

data.name: SMLvl5
data.value: Wonderful! Now you are ready to contruct barracks!

data.name: Resarch
data.value: Great! Researching technologies is a great way to get better silver production!

data.name: D2_Food
data.value:
Excellent! Note that your food is consumed in 2 ways - by troops and by maintenance workers on village buildings.

Troops consume food, that is obvious but also, since each building requires a certain amount of workers to maintain it and those workers consume food, therefore indirectly, upgrading buildings also requires food.

data.name: D2_BattleSimSpies
data.value:
Exactly! So as you can see, the chance for success is high, and there is only {0}% chance that the defender will be told it was you spying.

Chance the spies will
be successful		 {1}%
Chance the defender will know
the identity of spies		 {0}%
Chance the defender will
see the spies coming		 {2}%


The 'Chance the defender will see the spies coming' refers to the chance that the defender will know that someone is trying to spy on them. If they know, they can move more spies into this village to increase their chances of learning the identity of the attacker, but as you can see, there is a chance they will not know they are even being spied on until it is too late!

There is a lot more detail to learn about spying. You can find more information about Spies from the Troop Details section of the Tavern Building page.

data.name: D2_ClanMates
data.value:
Excellent!! Note that the clan icon will light up when ever there is a new post on the forum.

STRESSING ONCE AGAIN - BE ACTIVE in your clan. Leaders look for that and you are much more likely to get help when needed when you are known to the clan.

Active members are an asset to a clan, inactive members are often considered dead weight.

ALSO, clan leaders will often require active members to check in on the forum or risk being dismissed or cannibalized by the clan.

data.name: D2_TOU
data.value:
Very good!

Please remember, it is only a game and its about having fun ;)

Play fair, treat others with respect and enjoy!

data.name: D2_Mail
data.value: Great! All mail starred will never be deleted. However, once you unstar it then it is treated like any other message which is archived after 14 days and deleted after 30. Careful when removing the star status of older messages.

data.name: D2_Reports
data.value: Great!! All reports you Star will never be deleted. As with mail, once you unstar it then it is treated like any other report which is archived after 14 days and deleted after 30.
